subject: Re: [R] stringification magic in subset?
body:
Beautiful.  thank you.  /ivo

> Try:
>
> methods("subset")
>
> which will point you to "subset.data.frame". The latter code will answer
> your questions.
>
> HTH,
>
> --sundar
>
